typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Code_segment as string,
		Poste_segment as string,
		Id_transaction as string,
		Num_serie as string,
		Id_entreprise as string,
		Id_paiement as string,
		Code_moyen_paiement as string,
		Sens_paiement as string,
		Montant as double,
		Type_equipement as integer,
		Date_ope as timestamp,
		Name as string,
		Guid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 split(length(Code_segment)<50,
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(length check, )
ConditionalSplit1@length check derive(Date = currentDate(),
		System = "Atlas",
		FileName = "Merge.csv",
		Success = "No",
		Record_Detail = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		file_name as string,
		success as string,
		date as date,
		system as string,
		record_detail as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
